level.text: 113.1 The seal of the Authority shall be circular in form and shall havenscribed thereon the words “Washington Convention and Sports Authority,”District of Columbia,” and “Corporate Seal.”
113.2 The fiscal year of the Authority shall begin on the first day of Octobernd end on the last day of September in each year.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 3816, 3823 (June 12, 1998); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 10919, 10925 (November 19,010); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 8953 (June 14, 2013).
